My code and notes to accompany power point presentations in the `slides/` directory.


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load in libraries:
```{r}
library(synthpop)

```

Load in data:
```{r}
load("../data/bike1.rdata") 
```

Take a look at the data
```{r}
head(bike1)
```

```{r}
dim(bike1)
```

```{r}
colnames(bike1)
```


Version details of R and synthpop package:
```{r}
sessionInfo()
```
